医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新型传感器芯片检测疾病病原体的灵敏度提高了 10 倍德克萨斯 A&M 农业生命研究中心的科学家和爱荷华州立大学的合作者开发了一种传感器芯片，可以检测多种疾病病原体，其灵敏度是现有方法的 10 倍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/New-Sensor-Chip-Detects-Disease-Pathogens-with-10x-Sensitivity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/New-Sensor-Chip-Detects-Disease-Pathogens-with-10x-Sensitivity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=96a957f9-0541-47c2-b1f7-4d74d348b142 Mon, 26 Jun 2023 11:29:00 -0400 New sensor chip detects disease pathogens with 10x sensitivity
本地化：阿片类药物结算现金的公开报告在接下来的近二十年里，州和地方政府将从被指控引发阿片类药物流行的公司那里获得数十亿美元的资金。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/Localize-this-Public-reporting-of-opioid-settlement-cash.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/Localize-this-Public-reporting-of-opioid-settlement-cash.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=06659a18-5388-443d-a92b-bc3b99366a38 Mon, 26 Jun 2023 11:22:13 -0400 Localize this: Public reporting of opioid settlement cash
破解密码：机器学习模型预测青少年多动症症状研究开发了机器学习模型来预测儿童注意力缺陷多动症 (ADHD) 症状。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/Cracking-the-code-machine-learning-models-predict-ADHD-symptoms-in-youth.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/Cracking-the-code-machine-learning-models-predict-ADHD-symptoms-in-youth.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ebeb5f5d-883c-4a10-84b8-2c5ae90ed430 Mon, 26 Jun 2023 10:12:00 -0400 Cracking the code: machine learning models predict ADHD symptoms in youth
展望未来：婴儿对母亲脸部的视觉偏好预示着情绪恢复能力研究了婴儿对母亲脸部的视觉偏好的轨迹以及它们与发育的关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/Looking-into-the-future-infant-visual-preference-for-mothers-face-predicts-emotional-resilience.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/Looking-into-the-future-infant-visual-preference-for-mothers-face-predicts-emotional-resilience.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fad7f8a2-79cd-4011-b1f3-d7c4d9aad836 Mon, 26 Jun 2023 09:40:00 -0400 Looking into the future: infant visual preference for mother's face predicts emotional resilience
食用超加工食品是否会增加静脉血栓栓塞的风险？科学家研究了食用超加工食品与静脉血栓栓塞风险之间的关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/Is-consuming-ultra-processed-foods-linked-with-an-increased-risk-of-venous-thrombembolisms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/Is-consuming-ultra-processed-foods-linked-with-an-increased-risk-of-venous-thrombembolisms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=93bbb4f5-90e2-4839-a4c2-3d41902d2209 Mon, 26 Jun 2023 09:02:00 -0400 Is consuming ultra-processed foods associated with an increased risk of venous thromboembolisms?
揭开真相：热带狩猎采集者的饮食与古饮食假设相矛盾研究人员评估了热带狩猎者和采集者的饮食变化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/Unveiling-the-truth-tropical-hunter-gatherers-diets-contradict-Paleo-diet-asminations.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/Unveiling-the-truth-tropical-hunter-gatherers-diets-contradict-Paleo-diet-asminations.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fc66b4ca-b1f5-44d0-8361-209cfda01b48 Mon, 26 Jun 2023 08:36:00 -0400 Unveiling the truth: tropical hunter-gatherers' diets contradict Paleo diet assumptions
高 BMI 与 5 种风湿病风险增加相关乌普萨拉大学的一项新研究表明，较高的体重指数（BMI）会增加五种不同风湿性疾病的风险：风湿病、骨关节炎、痛风、银屑病关节炎和炎性脊柱炎。研究人员还指出，就痛风和银屑病关节炎而言，与男性相比，体重指数是女性更强的危险因素。该研究将发表在《关节炎与风湿病学》杂志上。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/High-BMI-linked-to-increased-risk-of-5-rheumatic-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/High-BMI-linked-to-increased-risk-of-5-rheumatic-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a65993a5-9972-493e-b8f2-b39f846d81d3 Mon, 26 Jun 2023 08:19:00 -0400 High BMI linked to increased risk of 5 rheumatic diseases
发现内脏完整的螽斯化石5000万年前，在现在的科罗拉多州西北部，一只蝈蝈死后沉入湖底，并很快被埋在细小的沉积物中，直到近年来它的压缩化石被发现为止。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/Katydid-fossil-found-with-internal-organs-intact.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/Katydid-fossil-found-with-internal-organs-intact.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ef754129-de44-4404-ae78-1eeadde14b61 Mon, 26 Jun 2023 08:16:00 -0400
“我们不会那样做”：为什么一对黑人夫妇不会众筹来偿还医疗债务九年前，当克里斯蒂·菲尔兹（Kristie Fields）接受乳腺癌治疗时，她在医院主动得到了一些建议：一名护士告诉她，在当地新闻上分享你的故事。观众肯定会送钱。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/e28098Wee28099re-not-doing-thate28099-Why-a-Black- Couple-wouldne28099t-crowdfund-to-pay-off-medical-debts.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/e28098Wee28099re-not-doing-thate28099-Why-a-Black- Couple-wouldne28099t-crowdfund-to-pay-off-medical-debts.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ffc22be1-08fc-446f-9fe6-766190b09ae0 Mon, 26 Jun 2023 06:49:00 -0400 ‘We’re not doing that’: Why a Black couple wouldn’t crowdfund to pay off medical debts
电子烟仍在美国泛滥，尼古丁剂量较高使青少年上瘾当 FDA 于 2016 年首次宣布有权监管电子烟时，许多人认为该机构会很快淘汰带有棉花糖、小熊软糖和果圈等吸引儿童口味的电子烟。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/E-cigs-are-still-flooding-the-US-addicting-teens-with-higher-nicotine-doses.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/E-cigs-are-still-flooding-the-US-addicting-teens-with-higher-nicotine-doses.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=14c93dc6-7a03-4d8f-a276-9f93e65a40f5 Mon, 26 Jun 2023 06:45:41 -0400 E-cigs are still flooding the US, addicting teens with higher nicotine doses
